data.text: @SusanSmythSL Boo to that!  Hopefully the symptoms won’t hang around for too long. Take the next few days and just rest that body of yours!
@SusanSmythSL You didn't ware your mask Susan
@SusanSmythSL I feel your pain, clear for 2 years then tested positive on Saturday, feel crap, tired and coughing, get well soon x
@SusanSmythSL oh nuts, so sorry! 🦠hope it’s over quickly! take it easy.
@SusanSmythSL My brother had just got over his second bout of Covid. Thankfully this last one was flu like. I hope you feel better soon. Take it easy.
@SusanSmythSL Same. Got the + antigen test at lunch and did a pcr this evening just to be sure. No way am I gona risk going home. Probably wouldn’t be able to drive anyway
@SusanSmythSL Ah Susan, sorry to hear that girl. Mind yourself and get better soon x 💗💕
@Cazdoestweets Yeah apparently most have a high temperature. My taste and smell are fine, throat is scratchy, eyes are sensitive and skin very sensitive. It’s so weird isn’t it
@SusanSmythSL Got positive test on 16th Feb.  Had heavy chesty cough, I got antibiotics as precaution on 19th, walked 12000 steps today, so ok again..👍
@SusanSmythSL We’d the high temperatures when we were sick but it seems that every case is different. How’s your taste and smell?
